CROP_INSERT: insert into crops (type, state, sow_date, harvest_date, storage_id, smallholding_id, quantity) values (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s)
CROP_UPDATE: update crops set type = %s, state = %s, sow_date = %s, harvest_date = %s, storage_id = %s, smallholding_id = %s, quantity = %s where id = %s
CROP_UPDATE_QUANTITY: update crops set quantity = %s where id = %s
SHOW_CROPS_MONTH: SELECT YEAR(harvest_date) AS year, MONTH(harvest_date) AS month, COUNT(*) AS crops FROM crops GROUP BY YEAR(harvest_date), MONTH(harvest_date)
SMALLHOLDING_INSERT: insert into smallholding (size, ubication, shape, delimited) values (%s, %s, %s, %s)
SMALLHOLDING_UPDATE: update smallholding set size = %s, ubication = %s, shape = %s, delimited = %s where id = %s
SMALLHOLDINGS_CROPS: select * from smallholding inner join crops where smallholding.id = crops.smallholding_id
STORAGE_INSERT: insert into storage (max_capacity, current_capacity, storage_ubication, equipment) values (%s, %s, %s, %s)
STORAGE_UPDATE: update storage set max_capacity = %s, current_capacity = %s, storage_ubication = %s, equipment = %s where id = %s
STORAGE_CROPS: select * from storage inner join crops where storage.id = crops.storage_id
DELIVERY_INSERT: insert into delivery (client_name, deliver_date, request_date, address) values (%s, %s, %s, %s)
DELIVERY_UPDATE: update delivery set client_name = %s, deliver_date = %s, request_date = %s, address = %s where id = %s
INSERT_DETAIL: insert into delivery_details (delivery_id, crop_id, quantity, crop_name) values (%s, %s, %s, %s)
SHOW_DELIVERY_MONTH: SELECT YEAR(deliver_date) AS year, MONTH(deliver_date) AS month, COUNT(*) AS deliveries FROM delivery GROUP BY YEAR(deliver_date), MONTH(deliver_date)
INSERT_USER: insert into users (email, nickname, name, picture) values (%s, %s, %s, %s)
